definition: self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
each sticks to his own opinion (idiom); chacun son gout
each sticks to his own view (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf

sentences.english: She gained the ear of the managing director and voiced her opinion.
sentences.chinese: 她說的話總經理願意傾聽，於是她就直抒己見了。

sentences.english: I think I am subjective and persistent during some cases.
sentences.chinese: 有些時候比較主觀，過於堅持己見。

sentences.english: The great question ahead for Microsoft is how to engage with a participative and opinionated community like this.
sentences.chinese: 微軟首要的問題是對這類社區的干涉和固執己見。

sentences.english: In the first case, you need to stick to your guns .
sentences.chinese: 在第一種情況下，你應該要堅持己見。

sentences.english: The members couldn't come to an agreement. They were at sixes and sevens.
sentences.chinese: 委員們不能達成一致意見，他們各持己見。

sentences.english: But maybe at this point it really is time to dig in our heels.
sentences.chinese: 或許在這點上，的確是該堅持己見了。

sentences.english: Stubbornness is like a wall that you set up between you and your mate.
sentences.chinese: 固執己見就好像一道牆築在你跟配偶中間。

sentences.english: Both men persisted in their have opinions or neither will concede.
sentences.chinese: 雙方都堅持己見並且不肯退讓。

sentences.english: But its thinking remained stubbornly the same.
sentences.chinese: 但那時，北約仍是固執己見。

sentences.english: From then on, many medical schools and various classics on medicine were brought into being in succession, each having its own strong points.
sentences.chinese: 自此許多不同的學派及經典著作相繼出現，各抒己見。

sentences.english: Progress is best made through discussion among people who have contrasting points of view.
sentences.chinese: 提高最好是在人們各持己見的討論中達成的。

sentences.english: Sound off3. Should people be fined for illegally downloading music?
sentences.chinese: 非法下載歌曲該被罰款嗎？來各抒己見吧。

sentences.english: The members couldn't come to an agreement. They were at sixessevens.
sentences.chinese: 委員們不能達成一致意見，他們各持己見。

sentences.english: So, when it comes to our own pursuits of happiness, we agree to disagree.
sentences.chinese: 所以，在追求快樂方面，我們同意各執己見。

sentences.english: "No family needs two dogs, "I began dogmatically.
sentences.chinese: 我先是固執己見地說道，“沒有人家需要兩隻狗的。
